task.title: Agenda Builder
task.abstract: The Agenda Builder allows portal and public users the opportunity to customize their event by registering, or unregistering, for additional schedule items.Authenticated users can unregister for free sessions during the registration process in the Community Portal, on the Checkout page, or through the Agenda Builder email. Unauthenticated users can unregister for free sessions only through the Agenda Builder email. Unregistering for a free session will delete the Registration Item object on the Attendee record.

step.cmd: Open the email received upon completing the event registration process in the Community Portal and click the Build Agenda button.
Event sessions display on the Agenda tab located in the sidebar menu. Click the item for session details and click the Add button to register. Repeat to include additional sessions.
step.info: Adding a session with a form attatchment will return an interview question modal. Complete the questions and click the Submit button.
In order to attend a waitlisted session, click the Join Waitlist button and enter Full Name and Email. Click the Add to Waitlist button.

step.cmd: After all desired sessions are added to the event schedule, click the Continue button.
Review the selected schedule items and enter payment information if any paid sessions are selected. Click the Pay button.
step.info: Edit schedule items directly on the Checkout page by clicking the Delete icon.

taskbody.result: A confirmation page is returned with the receipt detailing the event agenda.Waitlisted sessions will not display on the receipt.
